'''Rockin' Riffin' Chicken!''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Jueyun Chili Chicken]] with [[Xinyan]]. The recipe for Jueyun Chili Chicken is obtainable from [[Wanmin Restaurant]] for 2,500 Mora after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 20.

Rockin' Riffin' Chicken! increases all party members' CRIT Rate by '''16'''% for 300 seconds. In [[Co-Op Mode]], this effect only applies to your own character(s).
